about_the_game:
Add 10 beautiful Waifus to Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer; in all their natural glory!

10 new sliding puzzles with increasing difficulty to solve.
Be rewarded with an up close view of your Waifus in the gallery!

Add these new spicy Summer Waifus to your collection now for FREE with Hadaka Waifus!

content_descriptors.notes: This features Summer Waifus completely nude! There is no sexual acts, just beautiful nude Waifus!

detailed_description:
Add 10 beautiful Waifus to Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer; in all their natural glory!

10 new sliding puzzles with increasing difficulty to solve.
Be rewarded with an up close view of your Waifus in the gallery!

Add these new spicy Summer Waifus to your collection now for FREE with Hadaka Waifus!
name: Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer - Hadaka Waifus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 39 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: More than likely will work on requirements less than this.

short_description: Add 10 beautiful Waifus to Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer; in all their natural glory!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
